headline: Deutsche Bank Maintains a Buy Rating on EchoStar Corporation (SATS)
summary: EchoStar Corporation (NASDAQ:SATS) is among the 20 Best Performing Stocks in 2025. On December 19, 2025, TheFly reported that Deutsche Bank boosted its price objective for EchoStar Corporation (NASDAQ:SATS) to $131 from $97. It maintained a Buy rating in a research note.
